If exists, please present the valid relationships as a Markdown table with columns "['Specific Location', 'Broader Location', 'Whether the Specific Location is located in the Broader Location']". Make sure the table items are from the original paragraph.

Paragraph: On Monday , one man was lost from an oil rig off Grand Isle , La. , as the storm moved in.

Let's think step by step.

| Specific Location | Broader Location | Whether the Specific Location is located in the Broader Location |
|---|---|---|
| oil rig | Grand Isle, La. | Yes, an oil rig is located on or near land, in this case, Grand Isle, La. |
| Grand Isle, La. | La. (Louisiana) | Yes, Grand Isle is a part of the state of Louisiana. |

So, there are two location relationships found in the paragraph.
